title: Asthmaphobia v2.4.3 Released
content: • ESP issue where it would draw text randomly on your screen sometimes.
• Disturbed salt showing up as Voodoo Doll when using cursed item ESP.

title: Asthmaphobia v2.4.2 Released
content: • Customising the ghost activity (how active the ghost is)
• Noclip no longer moves when the menu is open or if the window is not in focus.
• It's less likely to crash after a game update.

title: Asthmaphobia v2.4.1 Released

title: Signal Group Launch
content: We're thrilled to announce the launch of our official Signal group! Join our growing community to:
• Share your best ghost hunting moments
• Get technical support directly from our developers
• Suggest new features or report bugs
Click the "Join Our Signal Group" button at the bottom of the page to become part of our community today!
